name: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint
description: This plugin is used to pull and push IoC data from Microsoft Defender for Endpoint. For details, visit [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/tiindicator?view=graph-rest-beta).

configuration.label: App ID
configuration.description: Client ID of your AzureAD Application

configuration.label: IOC Source (Applicable only while sharing IoCs)
configuration.description: The source where this indicator originated. This can be used for tracking where this indicator was defined. Limit 200 characters.

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the data for the initial run.
